trans-unit.source: An endpoint that uses WS-Discovery to find the endpoint address dynamically at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WS-Discovery 在執行階段中以動態方式尋找端點位址的端點。

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint> a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> is added to the binding you specify in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint> constructor if not already present.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint> 時，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> 會加入至您在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint> 建構函式中指定的繫結 (如果尚未存在的話)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> property enables you to describe the service you want to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> 屬性可讓您描述要使用的服務。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint> override these values specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> 使用的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint> 會覆寫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> 中指定的這些值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that provides a discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供探索端點的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria" /> used to search for a service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來搜尋服務的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> is used to describe the service to call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> 是用來描述要呼叫的服務。
